headers.og:title: Game Development Team | Pike Teams
headers.og:description: Join our Game Development team and learn to create your own video games. Perfect for students interested in game design, programming, and interactive entertainment.

headers.og:title: Natural Language Processing Team | Pike Teams
headers.og:description: Join our NLP team and learn to build AI systems that understand and generate human language. Perfect for students interested in artificial intelligence and language technology.

headers.og:title: Artificial Intelligence Team | Pike Teams
headers.og:description: Join our AI team and learn to build intelligent systems, neural networks, and machine learning models. Perfect for students interested in the cutting edge of technology.
